name: Urisis the Darkthrone - All Star to the Ouya Exclusive
blurb: From the cold depths of video game mayhem comes Urisis The Darkthrone.  Round two in bringing retro to an epic, Ouya experience.

rewards.reward: SUPPORT URISIS THE DARKTHRONE - Get your name on the credits screen. Send me a pic of yourself I'll shrink it and I'll include it near your name as on of the "URISIS FAITHFUL".
THE OUYA DOWNLOAD - With this reward you will be given a game code, fully unlocking it to the new Ouya game console.

THE OUYA DOWNLOAD AND COMIC BOOK MANUAL - With this reward you will receive the OUYA download along with the URISIS COMIC BOOK/MANUAL.  The same comic book manual in the boxed edition will be included HERE.

CODES AND SECRETS/NUMBERED AND SIGNED POSTER - This reward will get your hands on the OUYA DOWNLOAD along with cheats and codes that will get you new unseen characters, intros, secrets, levels and goodies you can enter in the cheats menu.  I will also include a LIMITED EDITON SIGNED and numbered POSTER which will include the secret codes on the back!!!

THE URISIS/OUYA VIDEO GAME BOX - Here you will receive the Limited Edition physical copies of the game. The boxed edition comes with a fully illustrated manual presented in comic book style. I'm going to go all out on this reward. The manual will include codes, special concept illustrations, and instructions to the game. The Ouya version will be included on a USB drive.

THE GOD PACK - You'll receive everything in the $50 BOXED bundle, but you'll also get the official MUSIC soundtrack, dubbed in high quality and will include hidden and bonus tracks. Plus you will get an official signed and numbered POSTER of the main character included in the game.

CREATE A CUSTOM WARRIOR - Here you will receive the EXCLUSIVE BOXED edition of URISIS (with the awesome comic book/manual), plus you'll get a chance to create your own personal  character. The character will be a hidden character and will wield a weapon, throw a projectile, and have unique animations just like any other warrior in the game. Your name and other adjacent info will be shown, along with a personal avatar.

THE LIFETIME BLOODSHADOW GAMES OUYA SUBSCRIPTION - I will now offer a lifetime subscription to all my future games for the Ouya. I will also include everything in the $50 dollar special boxed edition award. Plus I will send you yet ANOTHER non-physical copy of Little Ninja Bros, an alternate version of a game I have created around 10 years ago for the PC as token of my appreciation.

THE CUSTOM PLUSH TOY/CREATE A WARRIOR GARGANTUAN OUYA BOXED/ MUSIC PACK - WOW!!! Its all right here, you'll get to CREATE your own PERSONAL WARRIOR and add it to the Urisis lineup and you'll get your own personal BENDY PLUSH TOY of the same likeness. I'll need a few original references. The character will wield a weapon, throw a projectile, and have unique animations in the game just like any other. Your name and other adjacent info will be shown, along with a personal avatar in the game. PLUS you will receive the URISIS physical BOX as an added incentive you will receive the Hi-Res MUSIC SOUNDTRACK...
